text: Sally Lowenthal (born February 25, 1935), better known as Sally Jessy Raphael, is an American former talk show host. She is best-known for her talk show Sally (also called The Sally Jessy Raphael Show). Raphael's show aired from October 1983 to May 2002. The show covered marriage problems, out-of-control teenagers, pregnant teens and controversial topics. Raphael won an Emmy Award for her show during the late 1980s. She was nominated again in 1990. Raphael was born in Easton, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:American television talk show hosts Category:People from Pennsylvania Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1935 births Category:Living people
title: Sally Jessy Raphael
